name: Balloon Buddies Alpha
description:
A Roguelite cooperative Balloon Fight!  Warning: It's tough!

I worked on this game for a few months, put its development on hold (May 24th 2018), and would like to release what I have to see if anyone is possibly interested in playing this game.

Works with most types of controllers.

It's a one button game - the bottom face button (X on PS4, ex) will flap, and the left analogue stick (or D-Pad) will move.  You only move when flapping.

Hold down to do a ground pound attack.  It breaks boxes and kills enemies.

To revive someone, stand on their lifeless corpse and jam the flap button.  If that doesn't work (known inconsistent bug), try one of the other buttons.

If at any point you need to hard reset, hold all four face buttons and press Back (Xbox) or similar button on PS4 controller.  The game will reset.

Enter the Konami code (up, up, down, down, left, right, left right) on the start screen to enter the debug menu (change starting health, number of rooms generated, etc).  An error sound will chime that indicates the code has been reset (and you can start anew).

I made all of everything or else used open source assets (including many from Kenney).
